00066                 public function diario_comment_moderate()
00067                 {
00068                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00069 
00070                         $this->_batch_moderate('diario_comments');
00071 
00072                         if (isset($_POST['moderate-selected']))
00073                         {
00074                                 $comment_ids = is_array($_POST['id']) ? $_POST['id'] : array($_POST['id']);
00075                                 foreach ($comment_ids as $comment_id)
00076                                 {
00077                                         $comment = new DiarioComment();
00078                                         $comment->find_by_id($comment_id);
00079                                         $comment->belongs_to('diario_posts');
00080 
00081                                         // Notify previous commenters of the followup comment
00082                                         $comment_factory = new DiarioComment();
00083                                         // Obtain previous comments with followup notify set to true
00084                                         $previous_comments = $comment_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`post_id` = '{$conn->escape($comment->post_id)}' AND `followup_email_notify` = '1'"));
00085                                         // Include comment author in previous recipients to avoid auto-notifications
00086                                         $previous_comments_recipients = array($comment->email);
00087                                         foreach ($previous_comments as $previous_comment)
00088                                         {
00089                                                 if (in_array($previous_comment->email, $previous_comments_recipients) ||
00090                                                         !Email::is_valid($previous_comment->email))
00091                                                 {
00092                                                         continue;
00093                                                 }
00094                                                 $email = new DiarioCommentFollowupEmail(array('comment' => $comment,
00095                                                         'name' => $previous_comment->author,
00096                                                         'email' => $previous_comment->email));
00097                                                 $email->send();
00098                                                 // Append so it won't receive duplicate notifications
00099                                                 $previous_comments_recipients[] = $previous_comment->email;
00100                                         }
00101                                 }
00102                         }
00103 
00104                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'diario_moderation_queue'));
00105 
00106                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00107                 }
00108 
00113                 public function diario_comment_discard()
00114                 {
00115                         if ($this->request->is_get())
00116                         {
00117                                 if (!empty($_GET['id']))
00118                                 {
00119                                         $this->comment = new DiarioComment();
00120                                         $this->comment->find_by_id($_GET['id']);
00121                                 }
00122                         }
00123                         else
00124                         {
00125                                 if (!empty($_POST['id']))
00126                                 {
00127                                         if (is_array($_POST['id']))
00128                                         {
00129                                                 foreach ($_POST['id'] as $id)
00130                                                 {
00131                                                         $comment = new DiarioComment();
00132                                                         $comment->find_by_id($id);
00133                                                         $comment->delete();
00134                                                 }
00135                                         }
00136                                         else
00137                                         {
00138                                                 $comment = new DiarioComment();
00139                                                 $comment->find_by_id($_POST['id']);
00140                                                 $comment->delete();
00141                                         }
00142                                 }
00143                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'diario_moderation_queue'));
00144                         }
00145                 }

00165                 public function diario_post_add()
00166                 {
00167 
00168                         if (isset($_POST))
00169                         {
00170                                 $conn = Db::get_connection();
00171 
00172                                 $post = new DiarioPost($_POST);
00173                                 $post->author = $_COOKIE['_u'];
00174                                 $post->save();
00175 
00176                                 // Delete old tags (if any)
00177                                 $conn->prepare('DELETE FROM `diario_posts_tags` ' .
00178                                                 "WHERE `post_id` = '{1}'",
00179                                                 $post->id);
00180                                 $conn->exec();
00181 
00182                                 // Save tags
00183                                 $tag_tokens = explode(',', $_POST['tag']);
00184                                 $tag_tokens = array_map('trim', $tag_tokens);
00185                                 $tag_factory = new Tag();
00186                                 foreach ($tag_tokens as $tag_token)
00187                                 {
00188                                         if (empty($tag_token))
00189                                         {
00190                                                 continue;
00191                                         }
00192                                         $tag_results = $tag_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`tag` = '{$tag_token}'"));
00193                                         if (count($tag_results) > 0)
00194                                         {
00195                                                 $tag = $tag_results[0];
00196                                         }
00197                                         else
00198                                         {
00199                                                 $tag = new Tag();
00200                                                 $tag->tag = $tag_token;
00201                                                 $tag->save();
00202                                         }
00203                                         $conn->prepare('INSERT IGNORE INTO `diario_posts_tags` ' .
00204                                                 '(`post_id`, `tag_id`) ' .
00205                                                 "VALUES ('{1}', '{2}')",
00206                                                 $post->id,
00207                                                 $tag->id);
00208                                         $conn->exec();
00209 
00210                                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00211                                 }
00212 
00213                                 // Expires the cache of Diario
00214                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'index'));
00215                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'last_posts'));
00216                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'read', 'id' => $post->id));
00217                                 // Expires the cache of Diario feed
00218                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'feed', 'action' => 'diario'));
00219                         }
00220                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'diario_post_list'));
00221                 }
00222

00229                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))

00235 
00236                         $this->post->has_and_belongs_to_many('tags');
00237                 }

00243                 public function diario_post_list()
00244                 {
00245                         $post_factory = new DiarioPost();
00246                         $this->posts = $post_factory->find_all(array('order_by' => '`id` DESC',
00247                                 'start' => isset($_REQUEST['page']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['page']) ? (20 * ($_REQUEST['page'] - 1)) : 0,
00248                                 'limit' => 20));
00249                 }

00289                 public function software_comment_moderate()
00290                 {
00291                         $this->_batch_moderate('software_comments');
00292 
00293                         if (isset($_POST['moderate-selected']))
00294                         {
00295                                 $conn = Db::get_connection();
00296 
00297                                 $comment_ids = is_array($_POST['id']) ? $_POST['id'] : array($_POST['id']);
00298                                 foreach ($comment_ids as $comment_id)
00299                                 {
00300                                         $comment = new SoftwareComment();
00301                                         $comment->find_by_id($comment_id);
00302                                         $comment->belongs_to('softwares');
00303 
00304                                         // Notify previous commenters of the followup comment
00305                                         $comment_factory = new SoftwareComment();
00306                                         // Obtain previous comments with followup notify set to true
00307                                         $previous_comments = $comment_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`software_id` = '{$conn->escape($comment->software_id)}' AND `followup_email_notify` = '1'"));
00308                                         // Include comment author in previous recipients to avoid auto-notifications
00309                                         $previous_comments_recipients = array($comment->email);
00310                                         foreach ($previous_comments as $previous_comment)
00311                                         {
00312                                                 if (!in_array($previous_comment->email, $previous_comments_recipients) &&
00313                                                         Email::is_valid($previous_comment->email))
00314                                                 {
00315                                                         $email = new SoftwareCommentFollowupEmail(array('comment' => $comment,
00316                                                                 'name' => $previous_comment->author,
00317                                                                 'email' => $previous_comment->email));
00318                                                         $email->send();
00319                                                         // Add notifiee to previous recipients to avoid sending multiple messages
00320                                                         $previous_comments_recipients[] = $previous_comment->email;
00321                                                 }
00322                                         }
00323                                 }
00324 
00325                                 Db::close_connection($conn);
00326                         }
00327 
00328                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'software_moderation_queue'));
00329                 }

00380                 public function software_comment_mark_as_spam()
00381                 {
00382                         if ($this->request->is_post())
00383                         {
00384                                 if (!empty($_POST['id']))
00385                                 {
00386                                         $comment = new SoftwareComment();
00387                                         $comment->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00388 
00389                                         if (!Antispam::check_spam_signature($comment->text))
00390                                         {
00391                                                 Antispam::store_spam_signature($comment->text);
00392                                         }
00393                                 }
00394                                 $this->render(NULL);
00395                         }
00396                 }

00539                 public function software_artifact_list()
00540                 {
00541                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00542 
00543                         $artifact_factory = new SoftwareArtifact();
00544                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00545                         {
00546                                 $_REQUEST['id'] = 0;
00547                                 $this->artifacts = $artifact_factory->find_all(array('order_by' => '`file` ASC, `priority` DESC'));
00548                         }
00549                         else
00550                         {
00551                                 $this->release = new SoftwareRelease();
00552                                 if ($this->release->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00553                                 {
00554                                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'software_list'));
00555                                 }
00556                                 $this->artifacts = $artifact_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`release_id` = '{$conn->escape($_REQUEST['id'])}'", 'order_by' => '`priority` DESC'));
00557                         }
00558 
00559                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00560                 }

00566                 public function software_artifact_edit()

00569                         {
00570                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'software_list'));

00573                         $this->artifact->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00574                         $this->artifact->belongs_to('softwares');
00575                         $this->artifact->belongs_to('software_releases');
00576                         $this->artifact->release = $this->artifact->software_release;
00577                 }

00583                 public function software_artifact_create()
00584                 {
00585                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00586                         {
00587                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'software_list'));
00588                         }
00589                         $this->artifact = new SoftwareArtifact();
00590                         $this->artifact->release_id = $_REQUEST['id'];
00591                         $this->artifact->belongs_to('software_releases');
00592                         $this->artifact->software_id = $this->artifact->software_release->software_id;
00593                         $this->artifact->belongs_to('softwares');
00594                         $this->artifact->release = $this->artifact->software_release;
00595                         $this->render(array('action' => 'software_artifact_edit'));

00718                 public function software_downloads_by_release()
00719                 {
00720                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00721                         {
00722                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'software_list'));
00723                         }
00724                         $software = new Software();
00725                         if ($software->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00726                         {
00727                                 $this->flash(l('No such software'), 'error');
00728                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'software_list'));
00729                         }
00730                         $software->has_many('software_releases', array('order_by' => '`date` DESC'));
00731                         $this->releases = $software->software_releases;
00732                 }

00799                 public function server_error_read()
00800                 {
00801                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00802                         {
00803                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00804                         }
00805                         $this->error = new ServerError();
00806                         if ($this->error->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00807                         {
00808                                 $this->flash(l('No such element!'), 'error');
00809                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00810                         }
00811                 }
00812 
00817                 public function server_error_next()
00818                 {
00819                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00820                         {
00821                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00822                         }
00823                         $err = new ServerError();
00824                         $errors = $err->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`id` >= '{$_REQUEST['id']}'",
00825                                 'limit' => 1));
00826                         if (count($errors) < 1)
00827                         {
00828                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00829                         }
00830                         $this->error = $errors[0];
00831                         $this->render(array('action' => 'server_error_read'));
00832                 }
00833 
00838                 public function server_error_previous()
00839                 {
00840                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00841                         {
00842                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00843                         }
00844                         $err = new ServerError();
00845                         $errors = $err->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`id` <= '{$_REQUEST['id']}'",
00846                                 'limit' => 1));
00847                         if (count($errors) < 1)
00848                         {
00849                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00850                         }
00851                         $this->error = $errors[0];
00852                         $this->render(array('action' => 'server_error_read'));
00853                 }
00854 
00859                 public function server_error_delete()
00860                 {
00861                         if (!empty($_GET['id']))
00862                         {
00863                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_read', 'id' => $_GET['id']));
00864                         }
00865                         else
00866                         {
00867                                 if (!empty($_POST['id']))
00868                                 {
00869                                         if (is_array($_POST['id']))
00870                                         {
00871                                                 $conn = Db::get_connection();
00872 
00873                                                 $conn->prepare('DELETE FROM `server_errors` ' .
00874                                                         "WHERE FIND_IN_SET(`id`, '{1}') " .
00875                                                         'LIMIT {2}',
00876                                                         implode(',', $_POST['id']),
00877                                                         count($_POST['id'])
00878                                                         );
00879                                                 $conn->exec();
00880 
00881                                                 Db::close_connection($conn);
00882                                         }
00883                                         else
00884                                         {
00885                                                 $error = new ServerError();
00886                                                 $error->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00887                                                 $error->delete();
00888                                         }
00889                                 }
00890                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00891                         }
00892                 }

00898                 private function expire_cached_software_pages()
00899                 {
00900                         // Expires the cache of Software & Sparkle feeds
00901                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'feed', 'action' => 'software'));
00902                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'sparkle', 'action' => 'index', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00903                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'widgets_versioncheck', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00904                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'changelog', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00905                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'releasenotes', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00906                 }
00907 
00913                 private function _batch_moderate($table_name)
00914                 {
00915                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00916 
00917                         $has_deleted = FALSE;
00918 
00919                         if ($this->request->is_post())
00920                         {
00921                                 $query_preamble = 'SELECT 1 ';
00922                                 if (isset($_POST['delete-selected']))
00923                                 {
00924                                         $query_preamble = "DELETE FROM `{$table_name}` ";
00925                                         $has_deleted = TRUE;
00926                                 }
00927                                 else if (isset($_POST['moderate-selected']))
00928                                 {
00929                                         $query_preamble = "UPDATE `{$table_name}` SET `approved` = 1 ";
00930                                 }
00931 
00932                                 if (is_array($_POST['id']))
00933                                 {
00934                                         $conn->prepare($query_preamble .
00935                                                 "WHERE FIND_IN_SET(`id`, '{1}') " .
00936                                                 'LIMIT {2}',
00937                                                 implode(',', $_POST['id']),
00938                                                 count($_POST['id'])
00939                                                 );
00940                                         $conn->exec();
00941                                 }
00942                                 else if (isset($_POST['id']))
00943                                 {
00944                                         $conn->prepare($query_preamble .
00945                                                 "WHERE `id` = '{1}' " .
00946                                                 'LIMIT 1'
00947                                                 );
00948                                         $conn->exec();
00949                                 }
00950                                 if ($has_deleted)
00951                                 {
00952                                         $conn->prepare("OPTIMIZE TABLE `{$table_name}`");
00953                                         $conn->exec();
00954                                 }
00955                         }
00956 
00957                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00958                 }
00959         }
